description: Deletes the specified policy from the policy store. This operation is idempotent; if you specify a policy that doesn't exist, the request response returns a successful HTTP 200 status code.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that contains the policy that you want to delete.

parameters.name: policyId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy that you want to delete.
